name: Mansion of Sadness
description:
A game for Sega MegaDrive aka Sega Genesis

Created with SGDK, Stable DIffusion and Deflemask

And VNMD

Sounds from the Freesound

There are two versions of the game on in English (ENG) and one in Greek (GR)

There was no editor for the game so it may contain several syntactic or spelling errors, please inform me if you find any.

A bug was found in the ENG version, but now it is fixed, but cause the bug was passed anoticed in the testing face from now on the ENG version will have and the date on the file, untill players report that they were able to finish the game.

Sorry about that.

Controls:

Controls are in the arrangement of the MegaDrive

Button A: Advance text

Button B: Select an action when in selection mode

Button C: Fast Advancement of the text (This is recomended to be used only in replays)

D-Pad: Select action when in selection mode.
